profile.name: Raúl
profile.title: Project Leader - E2E international project leadership. Interact at all levels, technical and political. Architect | Agile Lead | Project Manager | Devops | Mobile / Cloud
profile.description: 24 years of experience holding positions in all phases of software development projects. In companies like Microsoft, Citrix, Capgemini and Cognizant as well as being Co-founder of two Start-ups. Occupying technical, management and customer relations positions. This experience allows him to understand projects globally, identifying dependencies, anticipating problems, and detecting areas of improvement. Sales, analysis, design, planning, development, testing (QA), deployment, support, continuous improvement; as architect, Technical Lead (TL), developer, mobile, back, Agile Coach, Scrum Master (SM), SRE, Project Manager (PM), PreSale. Leading teams of up to 30 people. Managing projects of several million euros. All using agile methodologies, distributed and international. Without losing his political and commercial vision of the projects, Raúl is looking for positions that allow him to apply new technologies and service to international clients. Raúl defines himself as a father, an optimist, an idealist, an engineer, a bit of a philosopher, a strategist, passionate about understanding and learning from everyone. With the goal of leaving a better world that we found, making a difference to the people we crossroads on the way.

interestingFacts.fact: Leo and Noa are my main motivation. To improve as a persona to make this world a little better that what we where given.

roles.name: Mobile Cloud Architect / Agile Lead / Project Manager
